```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
coords <- read.csv("coords.csv")
```

```{r}
library(DT)
library(leaflet)
```

## Occurrences: Table

```{r}
sp1 <- subset(coords, sp == params$sp)
datatable(sp1)
```


## Occurrences: Map

```{r}
leaflet(sp1) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat)
```
